title: Series of Vehicle Thefts - Industrial Zone
description: Multiple high-end vehicles stolen from the industrial district parking lots over two weeks. Pattern suggests organized operation.

persons.name: Marcus Chen
persons.statement: My BMW M5 was parked in the secured lot. Security cameras were disabled.

persons.name: David Park
persons.statement: Third car stolen this month from our company lot. Always luxury vehicles.

persons.name: Unknown Male
persons.description: Security guard reported seeing a white van circling the area nights before thefts.

evidence.description: Insurance claims from 8 vehicle thefts in the area
